metadata.purpose: Proof-of-concept image generation to validate approach for young adult male delivery rider / DJ character
metadata.age_appropriate_note: All scenes are age-appropriate for children ages 5-12. DJ/club scenes focus on music equipment and performance, not alcohol or nightlife.

scenes.title: Morning Alarm
scenes.lighting: dim gray morning light through thin beige curtains, phone screen glow
scenes.description: A 19-year-old Colombian man with medium brown skin and short dark brown hair with a fade cut sleeps in a single bed with a dark blue comforter in a small rented room. A smartphone vibrates on a plastic milk crate nightstand, alarm screen glowing. A small digital alarm clock reads 8:00. A folding table holds DJ equipment — a DJ controller with colored pads, a sticker-covered laptop, over-ear headphones. A red and black motorcycle helmet hangs on a wall hook by the door. An orange delivery backpack leans against the wall. Thin beige curtains filter gray Bogotá morning light. A small electric fan sits on the gray tile floor.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 19-year-old Colombian man with medium brown skin, short dark brown hair with fade cut sleeping in single bed, dark blue comforter, small rented room, smartphone alarm glowing on plastic crate nightstand, folding table with DJ controller and laptop, red and black motorcycle helmet on wall hook, orange delivery backpack against wall, thin beige curtains, dim gray morning light, gray tile floor, electric fan, working-class young man's room
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, luxury bedroom, large room, bright lighting, blonde hair, light skin

scenes.title: Sitting Up in Bed
scenes.description: Santiago sits on the edge of the single bed, bare feet on the cool gray tile floor. He hunches forward, elbows on knees, rubbing his face with both hands. His short dark hair is flattened on one side from sleeping. He wears black athletic shorts and a loose gray t-shirt. The dark blue comforter is bunched behind him. The small electric fan oscillates on the floor nearby. Across the room, the folding table with his DJ controller, sticker-covered laptop, and tangled audio cables is visible. The red and black motorcycle helmet hangs on its wall hook by the door.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 19-year-old Colombian man with medium brown skin, short dark brown messy hair with fade, sitting on edge of bed rubbing face, wearing black shorts gray t-shirt, bare feet on gray tile floor, dark blue comforter bunched, small rented room, electric fan on floor, folding table with DJ equipment visible, motorcycle helmet on wall hook, sleepy expression, morning
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, neat hair, alert expression, luxury room, blonde hair, light skin

scenes.title: Grabbing Helmet and Backpack
scenes.description: Santiago lifts the red and black full-face motorcycle helmet off the wall hook by the door, tucking it under his left arm. With his right hand he grabs the orange Rappi insulated delivery backpack by its top handle, swinging it onto one shoulder. He wears a black motorcycle jacket with reflective strips over a black hoodie, dark blue jeans, and black ankle boots. He pats his jeans pocket checking for wallet and keys. The smartphone is in his hoodie pocket. He takes one last glance at the room — DJ controller, laptop, headphones all waiting for tonight.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 19-year-old Colombian man with medium brown skin, short dark brown hair with fade, lifting red and black motorcycle helmet from wall hook, orange delivery backpack on shoulder, wearing black motorcycle jacket with reflective strips over hoodie, dark blue jeans, black boots, small rented room, checking pockets, ready to leave, morning
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, casual clothes, luxury room, blonde hair, light skin

scenes.title: Setting Up DJ Equipment
scenes.lighting: warm overhead bulb light, DJ controller LEDs glowing, laptop screen glow
scenes.description: Santiago sits in the plastic chair at the folding table, opening the sticker-covered silver laptop. The DJ software loads on screen — two virtual turntables, waveforms, and a crossfader. He connects the DJ controller via a USB cable — the controller's pads light up in a rainbow of colors: red, blue, green, purple, orange. The over-ear headphones with blue accents sit beside the controller. The room is lit by the overhead bare bulb and the colorful glow of the DJ controller and laptop screen. The thin beige curtains are dark — night has fallen.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 19-year-old Colombian man with medium brown skin, short dark brown hair with fade, sitting at folding table, opening sticker-covered laptop, DJ controller with rainbow LED pads glowing, USB cable connecting devices, over-ear headphones nearby, small rented room, evening, warm overhead bulb, DJ software on laptop screen, focused expression
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, large room, professional studio, daytime, blonde hair, light skin

scenes.title: Packing DJ Equipment
scenes.description: Santiago carefully disconnects the DJ controller from the laptop, coiling the USB cable neatly. He places the DJ controller into a padded soft case — a black nylon bag with a zipper. The sticker-covered laptop goes into a laptop sleeve and then into a black backpack. The over-ear headphones go around his neck. He wears black slim-fit jeans, a black graphic tee with a white electronic music logo, and the thin silver chain necklace. He double-checks the bag — controller, laptop, USB cable, headphone adapter, extra audio cables.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 19-year-old Colombian man with medium brown skin, short dark brown hair with fade, carefully packing DJ controller into padded case, laptop in sleeve, black backpack open on bed, wearing black slim-fit jeans, black graphic tee with white logo, silver chain necklace, over-ear headphones around neck, small rented room, evening, packing DJ equipment for gig
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, casual clothes, large room, daytime, blonde hair, light skin

scenes.title: Brushing Teeth
scenes.description: Santiago brushes his teeth with a blue toothbrush, white foam forming around his mouth. He holds the toothbrush in his right hand, left hand braced on the edge of the white porcelain sink. The Colgate toothpaste tube lies on the sink ledge beside the toothbrush holder, which holds several toothbrushes of different colors belonging to the house residents. The rectangular mirror reflects his focused expression. Water drips from the chrome faucet into the basin. The fluorescent tube light above the mirror casts even white light across the white tile walls.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 19-year-old Colombian man with medium brown skin, short dark brown messy hair with fade, brushing teeth with blue toothbrush, white foam around mouth, standing at white porcelain sink, rectangular mirror reflection, toothbrush holder with multiple toothbrushes, Colgate toothpaste tube, harsh fluorescent light, shared bathroom, white tile walls, morning routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, private bathroom, luxury bathroom, blonde hair, light skin

scenes.title: Post-Shower at Mirror
scenes.description: Santiago stands at the mirror with a blue towel wrapped around his waist and a smaller towel draped over one shoulder. His short dark hair is wet and darkened, water droplets on his brown skin. The mirror is slightly fogged from the shower steam, and he wipes a clear patch with his hand. The bathroom smells of soap. His plastic toiletries basket is open on the white plastic shelf — bar of soap wet, shampoo bottle recapped. The fluorescent tube light casts even illumination through lingering steam wisps. The clear plastic shower curtain is pulled to one side behind him.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 19-year-old Colombian man with medium brown skin, short dark brown wet hair, blue towel wrapped at waist, smaller towel on shoulder, standing at fogged mirror wiping clear patch with hand, shared bathroom, fluorescent light through steam, plastic shelf with toiletries, white tile walls, post-shower scene, modest and age-appropriate
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, inappropriate, suggestive, luxury bathroom, blonde hair, light skin

scenes.title: Shaving
scenes.description: Santiago spreads shaving cream on his chin and jaw, then draws a disposable razor along his jawline in smooth downward strokes. The mirror reflects his focused expression. He tilts his head back slightly. Shaving cream and stubble accumulate on the razor blade, which he rinses under the running chrome faucet between strokes. A blue towel is wrapped around his waist. The can of shaving cream with its blue cap sits on the shelf. The fluorescent light provides clear, even illumination for shaving.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 19-year-old Colombian man with medium brown skin, short dark brown hair, shaving jawline with disposable razor, shaving cream on chin, focused expression looking in rectangular mirror, rinsing razor under chrome faucet, blue towel at waist, shared bathroom, fluorescent light, white tile walls, grooming routine, age-appropriate
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, inappropriate, beard, luxury bathroom, blonde hair, light skin

scenes.title: Quick Cologne Spray
scenes.description: Santiago holds a small dark blue glass cologne bottle at arm's length and sprays it once on the side of his neck, then once on his wrist. The silver cap of the bottle glints under the fluorescent light. He rubs his wrists together briefly. The thin silver chain necklace glints against his brown skin. He checks his reflection one more time — satisfied. The toiletries basket is nearly repacked on the white plastic shelf. The rectangular mirror reflects the shared bathroom behind him — white tile walls, gray tile floor, the shower curtain to the side.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 19-year-old Colombian man with medium brown skin, short dark brown hair with fade, spraying cologne from dark blue bottle on neck, silver chain necklace, checking reflection in rectangular mirror, shared bathroom, fluorescent light, white tile walls, toiletries basket on shelf, getting ready, morning routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, luxury bathroom, large bathroom, blonde hair, light skin

scenes.title: Checking Mirror Before Going Out
scenes.description: Santiago stands close to the rectangular mirror, checking his appearance before heading out for a DJ gig. He adjusts the silver chain necklace so the clasp is at the back. He turns his head left and right, checking the freshly shaved jawline. He runs a wet hand through his short dark hair, styling the top forward. The black graphic tee with the white electronic music logo looks sharp. The dark blue cologne bottle reflects in the mirror. The fluorescent tube light illuminates the white tile walls. He nods at his reflection — ready.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 19-year-old Colombian man with medium brown skin, short dark brown hair with fade, checking appearance in bathroom mirror before going out, adjusting silver chain necklace, wearing black graphic tee with white logo, styling hair, confident expression, shared bathroom, fluorescent light, evening preparation, DJ outfit
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, elderly, casual clothes, messy appearance, luxury bathroom, blonde hair, light skin

scenes.title: First Traffic Light
scenes.description: Santiago stops the motorcycle at a red traffic light at a busy Kennedy intersection. He puts one booted foot on the pavement for balance, the engine idling. Other motorcycles line up beside him — delivery riders, commuters. A red TransMilenio articulated bus rolls through on its dedicated lane, long and segmented. Pedestrians cross the crosswalk. A street vendor on the corner sells tinto from a cart with a large silver thermos, pouring small cups. Santiago wears the full delivery outfit — red and black helmet with visor up, black motorcycle jacket with reflective strips, orange Rappi backpack. The traffic light hangs from a cable strung across the intersection.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 19-year-old Colombian man on red and black motorcycle stopped at red traffic light, wearing red and black helmet visor up, black jacket with reflective strips, orange delivery backpack, one foot on pavement, busy Bogotá intersection, other motorcycles, red TransMilenio bus on dedicated lane, pedestrians crossing, tinto coffee vendor cart on corner, overcast gray sky, traffic scene
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, empty street, night, American city, sunny clear sky, blonde hair, light skin

scenes.title: Handing Over Delivery
scenes.description: A customer appears at a metal security gate, opening it partially. Santiago holds out a white plastic bag of food with both hands, the orange Rappi backpack now open. The customer reaches through the gate to take the bag. Santiago's phone shows the delivery confirmation screen. He smiles — the delivery is complete. The motorcycle idles at the curb behind him. The narrow sidewalk has a concrete light pole and a small tree. The building is three stories of red brick with small balconies.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 19-year-old Colombian man with medium brown skin, short dark brown hair, red and black helmet visor up, handing white food bag to customer at metal security gate, orange delivery backpack open, motorcycle parked at curb behind, red brick building with balconies, narrow sidewalk, concrete light pole, overcast Bogotá sky, delivery complete, friendly smile
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, empty street, night scene, American city, blonde hair, light skin

scenes.title: Quick Break — Tinto Cart
scenes.description: Santiago stands beside his parked motorcycle at a street corner, holding a small plastic cup of tinto — hot, sweet black coffee — from a tinto cart vendor. The tinto cart is a metal pushcart with a large silver thermos, a stack of small plastic cups, a sugar container, and a hand-written price sign. The vendor, an older man in a cap and apron, pours another cup. Santiago sips the tinto, helmet resting on the motorcycle seat, visor flipped up. The orange Rappi backpack is on his back. A street mural depicting colorful tropical birds covers the wall of a building across the street. Traffic passes behind.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 19-year-old Colombian man with medium brown skin, short dark brown hair with fade, standing beside parked motorcycle at street corner, sipping hot coffee from small plastic cup, tinto coffee cart with silver thermos nearby, vendor in cap pouring coffee, orange delivery backpack, helmet on motorcycle seat, colorful tropical bird mural on building wall, overcast Bogotá day, coffee break between deliveries
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, child, empty street, night, Starbucks, American city, blonde hair, light skin

scenes.title: Rain Begins
scenes.description: Light rain falls on Bogotá. Santiago rides the motorcycle with raindrops speckling his dark visor. He flips the visor partially up to see better. The road surface glistens with water, reflecting the brake lights of cars ahead. Pedestrians open umbrellas on the sidewalk. A few dash into doorways for cover. The Honda CB 125's tires roll through shallow puddles. Santiago rides cautiously, keeping extra distance from the yellow taxi ahead. The green mountains — the cerros — disappear behind a curtain of gray rain clouds. The orange Rappi backpack has water beading on its surface.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 19-year-old Colombian man riding red and black motorcycle in light rain, Bogotá streets, raindrops on dark visor partially flipped up, wet glistening road reflecting car brake lights, orange delivery backpack with water beads, yellow taxi ahead, pedestrians with umbrellas, green mountains hidden by gray rain clouds, cautious riding, rainy day delivery
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, female, clear sunny sky, empty road, night, dry pavement, American city, blonde hair, light skin

scenes.title: Riding Home — Golden Hour
scenes.lighting: golden hour sunlight breaking through clouds
scenes.description: Santiago rides the Honda CB 125 toward home, heading south toward the Kennedy neighborhood. The late afternoon sun breaks through the clouds, casting golden light across Bogotá. The cerros — the green eastern mountains — glow warm in the low light. The avenue is busy with rush-hour traffic but flowing. Santiago's motorcycle jacket reflective strips catch the golden light. The orange Rappi backpack is empty and light on his back. He rides relaxed now — the work portion of his day is nearly done. Shop lights begin to turn on along the avenue as dusk approaches.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 19-year-old Colombian man riding red and black motorcycle on Bogotá avenue at golden hour, late afternoon sun breaking through clouds, green mountains glowing warm, rush-hour traffic flowing, motorcycle jacket reflective strips catching golden light, empty orange delivery backpack, shop lights beginning to turn on, beautiful dusk sky, heading home after work, peaceful riding
